title: Bug 18028Rename package doesn't check if all resources are writeable
description: Bug 18028Rename package doesn't check if all resources are writeable
OB: F1+ create a package with a CU in it make the CU readonly try to rename the package.observe: after finish you get an unexpected exception dialog.
EB: Preconditionchecking should check for read only files inside packages.
SR: F1+ create a package with a CU in it make the CU readonly try to rename the package.observe: after finish you get an unexpected exception dialog.
